TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract RibbonDropDown implements class Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonComponent, class Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonControl, class System.ComponentModel.IComponent, class System.IDisposable

summary.span: 表示一个用户可从中选择的项列表，以及一个用户可单击的功能区列表。

span.span: Represents a list of items that a user can choose from and a list of Ribbon buttons that a user can click.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以包含对象和控件。 A can contain objects and controls. 您可以通过使用 对象的方法在运行时创建。You can create a at run time by using the method of the object. 可通过两种方法来访问 对象：There are two ways to access the object: - 通过使用 Ribbon 类的 `Factory` 属性。By using the `Factory` property of the Ribbon class. 可从 Ribbon 类中的代码使用此方法。Use this approach from code in your Ribbon class. - 通过使用 `Globals.Factory.GetRibbonFactory` 方法。By using the `Globals.Factory.GetRibbonFactory` method. 可从 Ribbon 类外的代码使用此方法。Use this approach from code outside your Ribbon class. 在功能区加载到 Office 后, 不能在运行时向集合中添加按钮。You cannot add buttons to the collection at run time after the Ribbon has been loaded into Office. 下面的过程说明如何向添加对象和控件。The procedures below explain how to add objects and controls to a . ### 在设计时添加 RibbonDropDownItem 对象To add RibbonDropDownItem objects at design time 1. 在 "**属性**" 窗口中单击 " **Items** " 属性。Click the **Items** property in the **Properties** window. 2. 单击省略号 (**...**)。Click the ellipsis (**...**). 3. 在**下拉集合编辑器**中, 添加、排序和编辑新项。In the **DropDown Collection Editor**, add, order, and edit new items. 您可以在设计时将控件添加到。You can add controls to a at design time. ### 在设计时添加 RibbonButton 控件To add RibbonButton controls at design time 1. 单击 "**属性**" 窗口中的 "**按钮**" 属性。Click the **Buttons** property in the **Properties** window. 2. 单击省略号 (**...**)。Click the ellipsis (**...**). 3. 在**按钮集合编辑器**中, 添加、排序和编辑新的按钮控件。In the **Button Collection Editor**, add, order, and edit new button controls. 只有在功能区加载到 Office 应用程序中之前, 才能设置此类型的某些成员。Some members of this type can be set only before the Ribbon is loaded into the Office application. 有关设置这些属性的信息, 请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview)。For information about setting these properties, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview). [!INCLUDE[vsto_interface](~/includes/vsto-interface-md.md)] ## 用法Usage [!INCLUDE[vsto_net35mref](~/includes/vsto-net35mref-md.md)]

summary.span: 用户单击 上的按钮时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a user clicks a button on a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当用户单击`Item` 上的时, 不会引发此事件。This event is not raised when a user clicks an `Item` on a .

summary.span: 获取属于此 的 对象集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of objects that belong to this .

value.span: 一个属于此 的 对象集合。

span.span: A collection of objects that belong to this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件可以同时包含控件和控件。 The control can contain both controls and controls. 只能将按钮添加到属性, 然后才能加载功能区。You can add buttons to the property only before the Ribbon loads. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview)。For more information, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview).

summary.span: 获取或设置显示在此 上的图像。

span.span: Gets or sets an image this is displayed on this .

value.span: 显示在 上的图像。

span.span: The image that is displayed on this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建议的图像格式为 PNG, 因为 PNG 格式的图像通过其 alpha 通道支持透明度。The recommended image format is PNG, because images in the PNG format support transparency through their alpha channel. 属性标识控件显示的图像。The property identifies an image that is displayed by the control. 此属性可在设计时或运行时设置。This property can be set at design time or at run time. 如果在运行时更新此属性, 控件的外观将更新以反映更改。If you update this property at run time, the control's appearance is updated to reflect the change. 如果设置了 属性, 则将忽略和属性。 If the property is set, the and properties are ignored. 尽管属性比其他两个属性提供的控件更多, 但它可能会变慢, 因为每次更新控件时, 都会将 image 对象发送到 Office 应用程序。Although the property gives you more control than the other two properties do, it can be slower because the image object is sent to the Office application every time the control is updated. 属性`true`必须为, 控件才能显示图像。The property must be `true` for the control to display the image. 在设计时设置属性时, Visual Studio 会将属性自动设置为`true`。When you set the property at design time, Visual Studio automatically sets the property to `true`. 如果在运行时设置属性, 必须在代码中将属性设置为`true` 。If you set the property at run time, you must set the property to `true` in your code.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个名称，该名称可用于在 事件处理程序中标识控件图像。

span.span: Gets or sets the name that you can use in the event handler to identify an image for the control.

value.span: 一个字符串，可用于在 事件处理程序中标识控件图像。

span.span: A string that you can use in the event handler to identify an image for the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性标识控件显示的图像。The property identifies an image that is displayed by the control. Office 应用程序仅从解决方案中检索一次此映像, 以提高性能。The Office application retrieves this image from your solution only once, to improve performance. 只能在设计时设置此属性, 因为该属性标识的图像将在事件中加载。This property can be set only at design time, because the image it identifies is loaded during the event. 当显示功能区时, 每个映像名称只引发一次。 is raised only once per image name, when the Ribbon is displayed. 之后, 不能使用此属性更改控制图像。After that, the control image cannot be changed by using this property. 有关设置此属性的详细信息, 请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview)。For more information about setting this property, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview). 若要加载图像, 请将代码添加到事件处理程序。To load the image, add code to the event handler. 检查的属性,并将对象的属性设置为要加载的图像。 Check the property of the and set the property of the object to the image that you want to load. 如果设置了属性或属性, 则忽略此属性。This property is ignored if either the property or the property is set. 与属性标识的图像相比, 属性所标识的映像的加载速度要快得多, 因为 Office 应用程序只会在首次显示功能区时从你的解决方案中检索该图像。Images identified by the property can be loaded slightly faster than images identified by the property, because the Office application retrieves the image from your solution only the first time the Ribbon is displayed. 属性`true`必须为, 控件才能显示图像。The property must be `true` for the control to display the image. 在设计时设置属性时, Visual Studio 会将属性自动设置为`true`。When you set the property at design time, Visual Studio automatically sets the property to `true`. 如果在运行时设置属性, 必须在代码中将属性设置为`true` 。If you set the property at run time, you must set the property to `true` in your code.

summary.span: 获取此 中项的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of the items in this .

value.span: 中项的集合。

span.span: A collection of collection of items in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以在设计时或运行时向添加对象。You can add objects to a at design time or at run time.

summary.span: 在向 中加载控件时发生。

span.span: Occurs when controls are loaded into the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用户第一次展开下拉菜单时, 将引发此事件。This event is raised the first time the user expands the drop-down menu. 如果在运行时修改菜单上的控件或更改此的任何属性, 则当用户首次在更改之后展开菜单时, 也会引发此事件。If you modify the controls on the menu at run time or change any properties of this , this event is also raised the first time the user expands the menu after the change is made.

summary.span: 获取或设置此 的键盘快捷键。

span.span: Gets or sets the keyboard shortcut for this .

value.span: 此 的当前键盘快捷键。

span.span: The current keyboard shortcut for this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks KeyTip 必须包含1至3个大写字符, 不能包含空格、制表符或换行符。A KeyTip must have from 1 to 3 uppercase characters, and must not contain spaces, tabs, or newline characters. Keytip 有时称为 "访问键" 或 "加速器", 用作激活控件的快捷键组合。KeyTips are sometimes known as access keys or accelerators and are used as shortcut key combinations that activate controls. 按 ALT 键时, 功能区上将显示键提示。KeyTips appear on the Ribbon when you press the ALT key. 如果 KeyTip 与内置控件或其他外接程序的 keytip 发生冲突, Microsoft Office 可能会自动分配不冲突的 KeyTip 值。If your KeyTip conflicts with KeyTips for built-in controls or from other add-ins, Microsoft Office might assign non-conflicting KeyTip values automatically. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[使用键盘处理功能区程序](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=93523)。For more information, see [Use the keyboard to work with Ribbon programs](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=93523).

summary.span: 获取或设置此 上显示的文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the text that appears on this .

value.span: 此 上显示的文本。

span.span: The text that appears on this .

summary.span: 如果要使用内置 Microsoft Office 图标，请获取或设置要在 上显示的图像。

span.span: Gets or sets the image to display on the , if you want to use a built-in Microsoft Office icon.

value.span: 作为此控件图标的内置 Microsoft Office 图标的 ID。

span.span: The ID of a built-in Microsoft Office icon that serves as the icon for this control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性标识控件显示的 Office 图标。The property identifies an Office icon that is displayed by the control. 属性值是标识`imageMso`所选图标的值的字符串。The property value is a string that identifies the `imageMso` value of the selected icon. 此属性可在设计时或运行时设置。This property can be set at design time or at run time. 如果在运行时更新此属性, 控件的外观将更新以反映更改。If you update this property at run time, the control's appearance is updated to reflect the change. 有关`imageMso`值的列表, 请参阅 Microsoft 下载中心页面[Office 2010 外接程序:图标库](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=220760)。For a list of `imageMso` values, see the Microsoft Download Center page [Office 2010 Add-In: Icons Gallery](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=220760). 如果设置了属性, 则忽略此属性。This property is ignored if the property is set. 由于图像缓存在 Office 应用程序中, 因此可以比属性标识的图像稍快地加载属性标识的图像。Images identified by the property can be loaded slightly faster than images identified by the property, because the images are cached in the Office application. 属性`true`必须为, 控件才能显示图像。The property must be `true` for the control to display the image. 在设计时设置属性时, Visual Studio 会将属性自动设置为`true`。When you set the property at design time, Visual Studio automatically sets the property to `true`. 如果在运行时设置属性, 必须在代码中将属性设置为`true` 。If you set the property at run time, you must set the property to `true` in your code. ## Examples 下面的示例将 Microsoft Office 图标分配给下拉框。The following example assigns a Microsoft Office icon to a drop down box. 若要运行此代码示例, 必须首先执行以下步骤:To run this code example, you must first perform the following steps: 1. 向 Office 项目添加 "**功能区 (可视化设计器)** " 项。Add a **Ribbon (Visual Designer)** item to an Office project. 2. 将组添加到自定义选项卡。Add a group to the custom tab. 3. 向组中添加一个下拉框。Add a drop down box to the group. [!code-csharp[Trin_Ribbon_ControlProperties#3](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_Ribbon_ControlProperties/CS/Ribbon1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Trin_Ribbon_ControlProperties#3](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_Ribbon_ControlProperties/VB/Ribbon1.vb#3)]

summary.span: 获取或设置用户将指针移到 上方时显示的提示文本。

span.span: Gets or sets tip text that appears when the user moves the pointer over the .

value.span: 用户将指针移到控件上方时显示的文本。

span.span: The text that appears when the user moves the pointer over the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屏幕提示值的长度必须小于1024个字符。The ScreenTip value must be less than 1024 characters in length. 设置属性时 , 值显示为的标题。 When the property is set, the value appears as the title of the .

summary.span: 获取或设置当前选定的 。

span.span: Gets or sets the that is currently selected.

value.span: 当前选定的 。

span.span: The that is currently selected.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将此属性设置为, 则该项目将显示在下拉列表的文本框部分中。Setting this property to a causes the item to appear in the text box portion of the drop-down list. 分配给属性的引用必须存在于此对象的集合中。 The reference that you assign to the property must exist in this object's collection. 否则, 将引发。Otherwise, an will be thrown. 为属性分配新值不会引发事件。Assigning a new value to the property does not cause a event to be raised. 如果集合不为空, 则此属性不`null`为。 If the collection is not empty, then this property is not `null`. 默认情况下, 此属性引用集合中的第一项。By default, this property refers to the first item in the collection.

summary.span: 获取或设置当前选定的 的索引。

span.span: Gets or sets the index of the currently selected .

value.span: 当前选定的 的索引。

span.span: The index of the currently selected .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将 属性设置为索引号, 则集合中该位置的会出现在下拉列表的文本框部分中。 Setting the property to an index number causes the in that position in the collection to appear in the text box portion of the drop-down list. 为属性分配新值不会引发事件。Assigning a new value to the property does not cause a event to be raised. 分配给的值必须介于 0 (零) 到 (`Items.Count` -1) 之间。Values assigned to the must be from 0 (zero) through (`Items.Count` - 1). 如果集合为空, 则此属性返回-1。If the collection is empty, this property returns -1.

summary.span: 当用户在功能区下拉控件中选择新项时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a user selects a new item on a Ribbon drop-down control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅当选定项发生更改, 而不是在以下情况下引发事件:The event is raised only when the selected item changes, and not in the following circumstances: - 当用户选择已选择的项时。When the user selects the item that was already selected. - 用户单击按钮时。When a user clicks a button. - 在代码中向或属性分配新值时。When you assign a new value to the or properties in your code.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示与 关联的图像是否可见。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the image that is associated with the is visible.

value.span: 如果与控件关联的图像可见，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the image that is associated with the control is visible; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在功能区设计器`true`中设置、或属性, 则此属性将自动设置为。This property is automatically set to `true` if you set the , , or property in the Ribbon Designer. 您可以将其设置`false`为, 以使与此控件关联的图像处于隐藏状态。You can set it to `false` to cause the image associated with this control to be hidden. 在运行 时设置、或属性不会更改属性的值。Setting the , , or property at run time does not change the value of the property.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否为下拉菜单中的项显示图像。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether images are displayed for the items in the drop-down menu.

value.span: 如果显示图像，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the images are displayed; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅在某些情况下, 才能在运行时设置此属性。This property can be set at run time only under certain conditions. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview)。For more information, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview).

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否为下拉菜单中的项显示标签。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether labels are displayed for the items in the drop-down menu.

value.span: 如果显示标签，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the labels are displayed; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不能在运行时设置此属性。This property cannot be set at run time.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示此 的标签是否可见。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the label for this is visible.

value.span: 如果标签可见，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the label is visible; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

summary.span: 获取或设置一个字符串，该字符串确定 的大小。

span.span: Gets or sets a string that determines the size of the .

value.span: 一个字符串，其长度可确定此 的大小。

span.span: A string, the length of which determines the size of this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在功能区设计器中设置属性时, Visual Studio 会尝试调整大小以使其足够大以显示整个字符串。When you set the property in the Ribbon Designer, Visual Studio tries to size the so that it will be large enough to display the entire string. 尽管 Visual Studio 允许长度最多为1024个字符的字符串, 但实际上, 使用的字符串长度可能要短得多。Although Visual Studio allows a string of up to 1024 characters in length, in practice the usable string length might be much shorter. 仅在某些情况下, 才能在运行时设置此属性。This property can be set at run time only under certain conditions. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview)。For more information, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview).

summary.span: 获取或设置用户将指针移到 上时显示的多行提示文本。

span.span: Gets or sets multiline tip text that appears when the user moves the pointer over the .

value.span: 包含多行提示文本的字符串。

span.span: A string that contains multiline tip text.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字符串的长度必须小于1024个字符。The string must be less than 1024 characters in length. 显示在 " 文本" 下。The appears under text. 与不同的是 , 会在字符串中启用分行符。Unlike the , the enables line breaks in the string.
